rerankerScore": 1.6706111431121826,Key points:Vector search is specified through the vector "vectors.value" property. Keywordsearch is specified through "search" property.In a hybrid search, you can integrate vector search with full text search overkeywords. Filters, spell check, and semantic ranking apply to textual content only,and not vectors. In this final query, there's no semantic "answer" because thesystem didn't produce one that was sufficiently strong.Actual results include more detail, including semantic captions and highlights.Results have been modified for readability. You should run the request in thePostman collection to get the full structure of the response.Azure AI Search is a billable resource.
